title: Never While the Grass Grows
description: Betty Neels remains one of the most successful authors ever published by Harlequin RM. Her myriads of fans find a unique warmth and a reassurance of a better world in Betty's stories -- and this refreshing delight makes them top sellers every time. Beautifully romantic, traditional love stories just don't get any better than those written by Betty Neels...she is a must for all romance book sections!
author: Betty Neels
